name: Tini - Flight booking template
description:
Hi, welcome to Tini Flight Booking template. This template is built using the Tini Design System of Tiki. We are also building a Tini App solution where you can build and publish app(s) on Tiki platfotm.


Template includes:

  • UI screens for each OS (Android & iOS)
  • Flows


If you have questions or suggestions you can reach out to us on the Tini Design community


V1.0.0 - Initial release

Features:

1 - Booking flight

  • Search flight
  • Select flight
  • Additional services
  • Checkout

2 - Flight ticket management
